data.title: Bottom Mid and Elbow One Way
data.description: Control visibility in mid and B with these one way stars to allow you to hold off a push.

data.title: Default B Defend Stars
data.description: Use these stars to keep a B push under control while forcing attackers into the line of fire.

data.title: Default A Defend Stars
data.description: This lineup allows you to keep control of A Site visibility and force attackers into the line of fire.

data.title: B Main Anti-Post Plant Gravity Well Nova Pulse Combo
data.description: This is useful for stopping players from setting up Post-Plant lineups from behind the cover on the right side of B Main when looking into B Main from B Site.
